ssot__PartyIdentification__dlm.name: Party Identification
ssot__PartyIdentification__dlm.description: The Party Identification DMO represents the ways to identify a party, such as a driver's license or a birth certificate.

ssot__CreatedDate__c.description: The date when the record was created.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by external record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record came from, whether that is a name of a cloud storage file or another connectorâ€™s external object.

ssot__ExternalRecordId__c.description: A reference ID for an external data source system.

ssot__ExternalSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the system in which the external record ID was assigned.

ssot__Name__c.description: A required field used to specify the name of the identification, for example, California State issued Driver's License or LinkedIn URL.

ssot__Identificationnumber__c.description: The value of the identification, for example, driver license B1234456. Note: Also used in identity resolution.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to the business unit or other internal organization that owns the business account.

ssot__IssuedAtLocation__c.description: The location where the identification was issued.

ssot__IssuedByAuthority__c.description: The authority who issued the identification.

ssot__IssuedDate__c.description: The date the identification was issued.

ssot__LastModifiedDate__c.description: The date when a user last modified the record.

ssot__PartyId__c.description: A reference ID to the parent party, for example, an individual, business, or affiliation group.:::tip This ID is the same as the one used in the individual object.:::

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as the primary key for the party identification DMO.

ssot__PartyIdentificationTypeId__c.description: A reference ID to the additional information about a party used for greater organization.

ssot__PartyRoleId__c.description: A reference ID to the associated party role, for example, a customer, supplier, or competitor.

ssot__VerifiedByUserId__c.description: A reference ID for the user who verified the document.
